events.eventDescription: You can name your project in this section. You can also change who leads the procurement or add more colleagues to your project to help you evaluate suppliers.

eventTask.title: Change who is going to lead the procurement

events.eventDescription1: In this section you will be able to go into detail about what you require from a supplier, as well as setting a weighting for each requirement.
events.eventDescription2: You will then need to decide how many suppliers you want to take to further competition, before reviewing suitabe suppliers and choosing your next steps.

eventTask.title: Set your resources and vetting weightings
Choose highest security and vetting requirements
How well your team will scale
Where the work will be done
How many suppliers you'd like to take forward?

events.eventDescription1: In this section you will be able to tell suppliers about your business and the problem you need to solve, as well as any work that has already been carried out.
events.eventDescription2: You will also set your evaluation criteria and explain how you will score supplier submissions.

events.eventTitle: Upload pricing schedules and other supporting documents
events.eventDescription: Upload pricing schedules and other supporting documents. You will also need to confirm if you require a contracted out service or a supply of resource.

eventTask.title: Confirm if you require a contracted out service or a supply of resource

events.eventTitle: Add context to your further competition
events.p1: product road-maps and the expected life cycle of the product
events.p2: total cost of ownership, including running
events.p3: total cost of ownership, including running costs
events.p6: current and possible future scale of the requirement

events.eventDescription1: You can define how you will assess and evaluate applications.
events.eventDescription2: when running a further competition you must award the contract on the basis of the most economically advantageous tender(MEAT) and make it clear to suppliers how their bids will be evaluated.

eventTask.title: Add Your assessment criteria and evaluation weightings

events.eventDescription: Review the information you've entered, making sure you have included all relevant context, requirements, evalution criteria and weightings.

eventTask.title: Review and publish your further competition

form.question1: Write and publish your bidnpack for suppliers, who can then submit their responses and complete any other eevaluation tasks.
form.question2: You will need to provide a clear set of criteria and explain how you will score responses.
